sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import {useSpring, animated} from 'react-spring'; //import components import Quote from "./quote"; import DriverInfo from "./driverInfo"; function QuotesPage({driverInfo, setDriverInfo}){ //states to toggle the form on and off, and to input information to the form const [toggleAdd, setToggleAdd] = useState(false); const [postForm, setPostForm] = useState([]); //arrays that hold field names for driver name and age. Used when adding a variable to driverInfo array var names = ["name1", "name2", "name3", "name4", "name5"]; var ages = ["age1", "age2", "age3", "age4", "age5"]; function toggleAddForm(){ if(toggleAdd){ setToggleAdd(false); } else{ setToggleAdd(true); } } function addDriverField(e){ e.preventDefault(); // prevents page from reloading setDriverInfo([ ...driverInfo, {fName: "", lName: "", age: "", id: Math.random()*1000}, ]); console.log("DRIVERINFO: ", driverInfo); } //change the value of the postForm state and the input text box function inputTextHandler(e){ setPostForm((prevState) => ({...prevState, [e.target.name]: e.target.value})) } //Animation to open and close the 'Add a Quote' form const openAddForm = useSpring({ height: "85vh", opacity: 1, from: { height: "0vh", opacity: 0 }, config: { mass: 1, tension: 170, friction: 20 }, reset: true }) const closeAddForm = useSpring({ height: "0vh", opacity: 0, from: { height: "85vh", opacity: 1 }, config: { mass: 1, tension: 170, friction: 20 }, reset: true }) return(

); } export default QuotesPage;
